issue.title: New REST extraction interface does not store files in correct place.
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

New REST extraction interface does not store files in correct place.

Correct place is: @joomlaRoot/{configurablePath}/{orderID}/{productID}/{filename.ext}@

The interfaces creates a folder in : @joomlaRoot/{configurablePath}/{orderGUID}@ and store file in @joomlaRoot/{configurablePath}/{orderGUID+orderProductGUID}.zip@

Note:
@{configurablePath}@ = the path set in backend, relative to joomla root
@{orderID}@ = #__sdi_order.id
@{productID}@ = #__sdi_diffusion.id
@{orderGUID}@ = #__sdi_order.guid
@{orderProductGUID}@ = #__sdi_order_diffusion.guid

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.2
